text: athava te andhakara jevum, je atyanta unda samudramam hoya, jene uparana moja'o'e dhanki didho hoya, pachi uparathi vadalo chava'i gaya hoya, chevate andharum che, je upara nice hoya che, ke jyare potano hatha kadhe to te hathane pana na jo'i sake ane (vata evi che ke) jene allaha ta'ala ja nura na ape, teni pase ko'i prakasa nathi
